channel.title: Need help with my server. will pay
channel.description: Hello i need help with some coding on my server i am willing to pay via paypal. its a 317. Some of things i need doing, ar adding items, party zone, staff zone, donator zone, and lots more. If you think you can help please comment Skype name, and i will add you! :) Thanks

item.title: Need help with my server. will pay
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:11, topic:523874”][quote author=xXSh0ckXx link=topic=642419.msg4326563#msg4326563 date=1373027890]

no pay for help here.

also use google, commands for staffzone etc are pretty easy to find.

Stop posting The loveing same shit.

Paying for help is forbidden and will max. Result to punishment

Btw. Arcik a few minutes ago you accepted his offer, but np

mate, ill post what i want. its pretty simple to add a doantor zone or staff zone, if you search through google im pretty sure you will find 10+ guides or whatever that tell you how to do it.

Oh buddy, sure you can post what you want but you always say “google it” instead of helping. Next time link him to a thread or something like that, because what you do isnt that helpful.

Most of the time I’m searching through forums I’m on my phone, so it takes me twice as long to link otherwise I would

Same here, I’m always with my iPhone online, but i can link them to the specific thread. Why cant you do?
[/quote]

because im too lazy and on 3g so everything loads super slow, if i was on computer i would link them[/quote]
Alright it’s cool

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my server. will pay
